data.text:
FAQ

USD/NIO ‚Äì US Dollar to Nicaraguan Cordoba conversion

Our USD/NIO currency converter allows instant conversion by live rates. Current value of 1 USD equals 36.672557 NIO.

US Dollar to Nicaraguan Cordoba conversion

We use quotation information as of 08-17-2024 07:48 PM ET to calculate the conversion rate of two currencies. Specified values are considered average but can match the rates of specific financial organizations. To get a result, you only need to:

indicate an amount of money to convert in the window with US Dollars;

wait for automatic USD to NIO conversion.

With the help of this tool, you can convert any amount of US Dollars into Nicaraguan Cordobas in a few seconds.

How has the dynamic of USD to NIO rate changed in the last week

Here you can also find a chart with the US Dollar rate fluctuations since 2015. In the last week, the pound to dollar conversion rate has changed by -0.1453 NIO or -0.3961%.

The dynamic of USD to NIO rate over the last month

The monthly data of USD to NIO conversion rate dynamic helps to understand market trends better. USD has moved by -0.3283% or -0.1204 NIO.
